nbttag: {ench:[],HideFlags:254,display:{Lore:[0:"§8Consumed on use",1:"",2:"§7§7Pet items can boost pets in various",3:"§7ways but pets can only hold 1 item at",4:"§7a time so choose wisely!",5:"",6:"§7§7While unequipped this pet gains §a25%",7:"§a§7of the equipped pet's Exp, this is",8:"§7split between all pets holding the item.",9:"",10:"§7§eRight-click on your summoned pet to",11:"§egive it this item!",12:"",13:"§5§lEPIC PET ITEM"],Name:"§5Exp Share"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"PET_ITEM_EXP_SHARE"}}
